Detailed Description

The node is an abstract base class for ROS nodes. It sets up a node handle and offers default spin() method, which can be overridden. Overriding the constructor makes it possible to customize the initialization of the class.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Node::spin ( )
inlinevirtual

This method should contain the ROS logic. The default implementation places ROS in a message handling loop (ros::spin()).

Reimplemented in robot_hand::Brain, visualization::Gripper, and robot_hand::Eyes.
